00029 RgbColor::RgbColor (double redChannel, double greenChannel, double blueChannel)
00030 {
00031     if ( redChannel > 1.0 )
00032         red = 1.0;
00033     else
00034     {
00035         if ( redChannel < 0.0 )
00036             red = 0.0;
00037         else
00038             red = redChannel;
